content.question: A turntable with rotational inertia <math alttext="I" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is spinning on a frictionless axis at an initial angular speed of <math alttext="omega sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext></mtext><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>o</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. A funnel is positioned above the turntable and drops syrup in a circle onto the turntable at a radius of <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. If the funnel drops the syrup at a rate of <math alttext="the fraction S k g over s" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>S</mi><mtext> </mtext><mtext> kg/s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, what is the speed of the turntable as a function of time?

choices.label: <math alttext="omega sub f equals, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator I, and denominator I plus S t R, close parenthesis, end fraction, times omega sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext></mtext><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>f</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>I</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>S</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo><mtext></mtext><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>o</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="omega sub f equals, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator I, and denominator I plus S R, close parenthesis, end fraction, times omega sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>I</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>S</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo><msub><mrow><mtext></mtext><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>o</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="omega sub f equals, the fraction with numerator I, and denominator, open parenthesis, I plus S t R squared, close parenthesis, end fraction, times omega sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>S</mi><mi>t</mi><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="omega sub f equals, the fraction with numerator 2 I, and denominator, open parenthesis, I plus S t R squared, close parenthesis, end fraction, times, open parenthesis, omega sub 0, end sub, times t, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>S</mi><mi>t</mi><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="omega sub f equals, the fraction with numerator 2 I, and denominator, open parenthesis, I plus S t R squared, close parenthesis, times t, end fraction, times omega sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>S</mi><mi>t</mi><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="omega sub f equals, the fraction with numerator I, and denominator, open parenthesis, I plus S t R squared, close parenthesis, end fraction, times omega sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>S</mi><mi>t</mi><msup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
